      • securePostWithKey

        public static java.lang.String securePostWithKey(java.lang.String url,
                                                 java.io.InputStream keyInput,
                                                 java.lang.String parameters)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute a secured POST request
        Parameters:
        url - URL to request
        keyInput - the secret key to be used
        parameters - Parameters in form name=Tom&password=pass123. They needn't to be URL-encoded(it will be done automatically)
        Returns:
        The result of request
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - I/O Exception, HTTP errors or invalid key

      • doJSONPost

        public static java.lang.String doJSONPost(java.lang.String url,
                                          IJSONSerializable request)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Posts a JSON object to URL and returns result
        Parameters:
        url - URL to request
        request - the object to send using post. It will be serialized to JSON string
        Returns:
        Result of request
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - I/O Exception or HTTP errors
